pros: Some of the staff is nice
cons: Terrible management, hire employees who sit and do nothing while they expect others to pick up more work and take on more stress for them. When complaining to manager, manager says they will do something about it but never does. Most of the staff lies and backstabs to get ahead. They don't pay enough for the work and stress we go through. Would not ever recommend working here!

review_title: This was one of my favorite places to work.
job_title: Document Processing Associate in South Bend, IN
pros: Learning all that the Foundation offered and how they gave back to the community.
cons: Technology was on the back burner for most employees there.

review_title: Service to the community for over 100 years
pros: They provide a great Blood bank service for the local community.
cons: They are very unorganized and outdated
